mapper.sql: id, kode_sekolah as kodeSekolah, nomor_induk as noInduk,name as nama,password, user_type as userType,status_user as statusUser, created_on as createdOn, updated_on as updatedOn
mapper.select: select k.id,k.kode_kelas as kodeKelas,k.nama_kelas as namaKelas, k.wali_kelas_id as waliKelasId, k.created_on as createdOn, k.updated_on as updatedOn from user u inner join user_sekolah_kelas usk on u.id = usk.user_id inner join kelas k on k.id = usk.kelas_id where u.kode_sekolah = #{kodeSekolah} and u.id = #{userIdLogin}
